scripts.install-all: npm install && cd raktar-backend && npm install && cd ../raktar-frontend && npm install
scripts.prisma:setup: cd raktar-backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name create_basic_table
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue,bgMagenta" "cd raktar-backend && npm run start:dev" "cd raktar-frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.master: npm run install-all && npm run prisma:setup && npm run dev
